turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey assistant, can you order me a pizza from Papa John's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, that'd be no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a pizza with pineapples and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They're out of mushrooms right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Darn, well, I guess I'll order a pineapple and sausage pizza then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large for dinner tonight with my family.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you just want the one pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of sauce did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just want regular tomato sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just need original.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you just want a round pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah I don't need anything fancy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, this is going to go on your account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat the order back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want a large round pizza with original crust, tomato sauce, pineapple, and sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I put in the order. It will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What about my receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be sent to your cellphone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you for your help.
